TopicTitle: Kerbins atmosphere and clouds disappear when on the Mun

Articles.Content:
Early access version of KSP2

I use Win 10 and my specs are: RTX 2080, Ryzen R/ 2700x, 32 GB DDR4 Ram @3200 hz. I run the game from my SSD. 

When i was Flying my first mission to the mun, i realised that the clouds and atmosphere from kerbin disappeared halfway to the Mun. In the map view, they were still there, in vessel view they were gone. I switched back and forth between map and vessel view and it dindt fix it. I dont know how to reproduce the bug.
